org.apache.taverna.reference.impl

Class TranslationPath

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.taverna.reference.impl.TranslationPath
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<TranslationPath>, Iterable<ExternalReferenceTranslatorSPI<?,?>>

    public class TranslationPath
extends Object
implements Comparable<TranslationPath>, Iterable<ExternalReferenceTranslatorSPI<?,?>>
    A path from one external reference to another along with a total estimated path cost through one or more reference translators.

      • getDereferenceBasedPaths

        public List<TranslationPath> getDereferenceBasedPaths(ReferenceSet rs)
        Return a list of translation paths based on this one but which start at an existing reference within the supplied reference set. Will only function if there is a reference builder registered that can build the initial reference type used by this translation path, otherwise it returns an empty list.
        Parameters:
        rs -
        Returns:
